32:         $err.Exception.ErrorCode | Should -Be 801

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: The problem is that it's looking for libpsrpclient.so in $pshome/linux-x64 folder. Even after copying it there, it has some dependencies and the symlinks are going to the wrong version on the OS.  After manually fixing, the tests pass.

comments.author: msftbot[bot]
comments.body:
:tada:This issue was addressed in #11390, which has now been successfully released as `v7.0.0-rc.2`.:tada:

Handy links:
* [Release Notes](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/releases/tag/v7.0.0-rc.2)

title: Basic Auth over HTTP not allowed on Unix.New-PSSession test failing on Debian 10
